import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import ModalVideo from 'react-modal-video' import videobg from '../../../assets/img/video-bg/video-1.jpg' import playicon from '../../../assets/img/icons/play.svg' import lines from '../../../assets/img/lines/08.png' function Video(props) { const [openVideo, setOpenVideo] = useState(false) const openVideoModal = () => { setOpenVideo(true) } return (
